attachments.title: Impacts of epidemic outbreaks on supply chains: Mapping a research agenda amid the COVID-19 pandemic through a structured literature review
attachments.citation: Queiroz, M. M., Ivanov, D., Dolgui, A., & Fosso Wamba, S. (2022). Impacts of epidemic outbreaks on supply chains: Mapping a research agenda amid the COVID-19 pandemic through a structured literature review. Annals of Operations Research, 319(1), 1159–1196. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10479-020-03685-7

attachments.title: Worldwide trends in the scientific production on rural depopulation, a bibliometric analysis using bibliometrix R-tool
attachments.citation: Rodríguez Soler, R., Uribe-Toril, J., & De Pablo, J. (2020). Worldwide trends in the scientific production on rural depopulation, a bibliometric analysis using bibliometrix R-tool. Land Use Policy, 97, 104787. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.landusepol.2020.104787

attachments.title: Literature review as a research methodology - an overview and guidelines
attachments.citation: Snyder, H. (2019). Literature review as a research methodology—An overview and guidelines. Journal of Business Research, 104, 333–339. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jbusres.2019.07.039

prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：分别指出这些论文的研究方法, 属于  Meta-Analyses 还是  Systematic Reviews?

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Impacts of epidemic outbreaks on supply chains: Mapping a research agenda amid the COVID-19 pandemic through a structured literature review, was published on 2022. (It can be cite this paper as Queiroz et al., 2022 on your answer). 
- Worldwide trends in the scientific production on rural depopulation, a bibliometric analysis using bibliometrix R-tool, was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Rodríguez Soler et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- Literature review as a research methodology - an overview and guidelines, was published on 2019. (It can be cite this paper as Snyder, 2019 on your answer).
response:
根据您提供的文件内容和指令，以下是对每篇论文的研究方法的分析：

### 1. "Impacts of epidemic outbreaks on supply chains: Mapping a research agenda amid the COVID-19 pandemic through a structured literature review" (Queiroz et al., 2022)

这篇论文采用了**结构化文献综述**的方法。在文中，作者明确指出了他们使用的是系统化分析方法来审视疫情爆发对供应链的影响，并以结构化文献综述为指导，整理了一系列独特的出版物。他们通过这种方法揭示了新的研究张力和分类/分类方法，并提出了一个框架，用于在COVID-19大流行期间指导运营管理和供应链管理。

### 2. "Worldwide trends in the scientific production on rural depopulation, a bibliometric analysis using bibliometrix R-tool" (Rodríguez Soler et al., 2020)

Rodríguez Soler等人(2020)的研究使用了**文献计量分析**，特别是利用了Bibliometrix R工具来分析关于农村人口减少的科学生产趋势。这项研究并非传统意义上的Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews，而是通过定量方法来评估和监控已发表的研究，侧重于分析出版物、引用和信息来源。

### 3. "Literature review as a research methodology - an overview and guidelines" (Snyder, 2019)

Snyder(2019)的论文提供了关于**文献综述**作为研究方法的概述和指导。文中讨论了不同类型的综述，包括叙述性综述(Narrative Reviews)、综合性综述(Integrative Reviews)、系统综述(Systematic Reviews)和元分析(Meta-Analyses)。这篇论文本身并不是一个Meta-Analysis或Systematic Review，而是提供了如何进行和评估文献综述的指导。

综上所述，根据提供的文件内容：

- Queiroz等人(2022)的研究方法更接近于Systematic Reviews的结构化文献综述。
- Rodríguez Soler等人(2020)的研究方法主要是文献计量分析，不属于Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews。
- Snyder(2019)提供了关于不同类型文献综述的概述和指导，其本身也不是Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews的研究实例。
title:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨
quection: 基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：分别指出这些论文的研究方法, 属于  Meta-Analyses 还是  Systematic Reviews?
